text.0: to agni send i forth my song to him the bull of all the folk.
text.1: so may he bear us past our foes.
text.2: who from the distance far away shines brilliantly across the wastes.
text.3: so may he bear us past our foes.
text.4: the bull with brightlygleaming flame who utterly consumes the fiends.
text.5: so may he bear us past our foes.
text.6: who looks on all existing things and comprehends them with his view.
text.7: so may he bear us past our foes.
text.8: resplendent agni who was born in farthest region of the air.
text.9: so may he bear us past our foes.
